price: 36 Pharaon ordonna : « Haman ! Fais-moi construire une tour afin que je puisse atteindre les portes,
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ ٱبۡنِ لِي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَبۡلُغُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu yāhāmānu ib'ni lī ṣarḥan laʿallī ablughu al-asbāba
